transport4future.TokenManagement.controller

Class TokenManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • transport4future.TokenManagement.controller.TokenManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TokenManagerInterface

    public class TokenManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements TokenManagerInterface
    This class manages tokens, so it's purely a controller that handles actions on Tokens.
